snippet: For Los Angeles’ manager Don Mattingly, the struggling Dodgers can learn from last year’s Cardinals, whose late-season surge resulted in a title for St. Louis.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column notes that for Los Angeles Dodgers manager Don Mattingly, the struggling Dodgers can learn from last year’s St Louis Cardinals, whose late-season surge resulted in a title. (Series: The Wild West)
lead_paragraph: For Los Angeles’ manager Don Mattingly, the struggling Dodgers can learn from last year’s Cardinals, whose late-season surge resulted in a title for St. Louis.

headline.seo: Don Mattingly Hopes His Dodgers Are This Year’s Late Bloomers
headline.main: Dodgers Hope to Be This Year’s Late Bloomers
headline.print_headline: Dodgers Hope to Be This Year’s Late Bloomers
